EmailTemplate.name: CR 6.4 Reject due to DBS
EmailTemplate.subject: Check your DBS status on the Staffing Website
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your local staffing team. Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Following your recent phone call with the Staffing Team, after reviewing your DBS we are unfortunately unable to offer you a place to work with us on the NCS programme. This decision is final and was made with reference to our strict policy guidelines on working with young people.
We thank you for your interest in The Challenge. Best wishes,
The Challenge
NCS programme
